Text:
Always need my fill of M. Savage.


Thanks as always.

Thanks a bunch Atom.  Ever since KNEW dropped him, I have no way of getting the show.

Are most of you listening because you agree with him, or because he's an audio trainwreck?
I listen because he speaks truth to power and those cowards in england are pissing in their pink panties at very thought of hearing what he has to say!!!!! Thanks again atom your the man :-)
Michael Savage is a genius. He scares marionette puppets in Washington. Government lies constantly. Savage tells the truth!  Thanks for the upload.
